response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. This product holds immense value to me, but I am confident it can be even more transformative for you. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between its worth to you and its significance to me. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
